100146.text: EndpointSlice controller is now less likely to emit FailedToUpdateEndpointSlices events.
100146.markdown: EndpointSlice controller is now less likely to emit FailedToUpdateEndpointSlices events. ([#100146](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/100146), [@robscott](https://github.com/robscott)) [SIG Apps and Network]
100146.author: robscott

95301.text: Kubelet now cleans up orphaned volume directories automatically
95301.markdown: Kubelet now cleans up orphaned volume directories automatically ([#95301](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/95301), [@lorenz](https://github.com/lorenz)) [SIG Node and Storage]
95301.author: lorenz

96021.text: All data is no longer automatically deleted when a failure is detected during creation of the volume data file on a CSI volume. Now only the data file and volume path is removed.
96021.markdown: All data is no longer automatically deleted when a failure is detected during creation of the volume data file on a CSI volume. Now only the data file and volume path is removed. ([#96021](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/96021), [@huffmanca](https://github.com/huffmanca)) [SIG Storage]
96021.author: huffmanca

98943.text: fixing a bug where a failed node may not have the NoExecute taint set correctly
